satellite.heading: Sataylayt
satellite.specs:
Dimenshɔn dɛn: 50x58x64 mm
1P PocketQube we yu de yuz
Weyt: 245 gr
Di tin dɛn we dɛn yuz: aluminiɔm, gold, fayv glas, ɛn ilɛktronik tin dɛn.
Ɔbit: Ayt 525 ± 25 km; inklinεshכn: SSO 97.6 ± 0.1°
Lanch: PSLV (Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle) we ISRO de ɔpres

antenna.heading: Antena/Skulpchɔ we dɛn mek
antenna.specs:
Dimensions: 6 m (diamita) e 1.2m (hayt)
Weyt: 46 kg
Di tin dɛn we dɛn yuz: aluminiɔm, ɛpoksi miro bɔd, gold aluminiɔm dome we dɛn suspɛnd tru wan skɔfɔl strɔkchɔ.

radio.heading: Redio Speks
radio.specs:
Daunlink: 468.5 MHz we yu go yuz
Mɔdyuleshɔn: CSS
Bandwidth: TBD we gɛt di rayt fɔ yuz am
